archimate:Requirement.name: SY.2.4.5e: e) documents associated with systems and networks are updated (e.g. asset register, design information, system configuration, implementation details, and records of all changes to systems and networks)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
